 2022-09512022-09-15,  ,  ,  MHA, 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of CURTIS CLARKE of Victoria, British-Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective December 10, 2022.
